{*DO NOT DELETE THE AFFILIATE LOADER. THAT IS WHAT PULLS IN YOUR AFFILIATE INFORMATION AND LOGO.*} {include "affiliate_loader"} Don't miss Justice is Just Us training! {include "pre-header-spacing"} {*Remove beacon from text version only.*} {beacon}

{include "default_salutation"}–

In lieu of our in-person annual lobby days, we are excited to invite you to our virtual Justice is Just Us Training!

Join the ACLU of Idaho advocacy and legislative staff for our virtual Justice is Just Us Training, where together we will learn about how to lobby, testify, and advocate to your lawmaker on issues that are important to you. The 2021 Idaho legislative session presents new challenges this year, nonetheless, our team has prepared a lobby training where we will share tips and techniques on how to virtually engage this session. We will also have breakout sessions in which we will go more in-depth on the issue areas we are focusing on this session. This will be a unique opportunity to learn about legislative strategy and engage in a group discussion on issues you care about with the community and an ACLU staff member.

Don't miss out on this training! Register today. Please note: This link will take you to a third-party website, everyaction.com.

{affiliate_name}

Monday, February 15, 6 p.m.
Zoom Meeting
Details sent after registration.

Please note: This link will take you to a third-party website, everyaction.com.

Join the ACLU of Idaho advocacy and legislative staff for our virtual Justice is Just Us training, where together we will learn about how to lobby, testify, and advocate to your lawmaker on issues that are important to you.

The 2021 Idaho legislative session presents new challenges this year, but nonetheless, our team has prepared a lobby training where we will share tips and techniques on how to virtually engage this session. We will also have breakout sessions in which we will go more in depth on the issue areas we are focusing on this session. This will be a unique opportunity to learn about legislative strategy and engage in a group discussion on issues you care about with the community and an ACLU staff member.

Don't miss out on this training!
